entries.maleVariant: Ahem... Hey, V. How's life on the road? Is it like they said it'd be? Heh...
Huh. 'Course, fuckin' voicemail... You're probably cruising in a different time zone, or in fuckin' orbit for all I know.
Hey, V, me again. Still not pickin' up, huh? Can't stand uncomfortable convos?

entries.femaleVariant: Hey, V, so funny thing just happened-- Ah, for fuck's sake... Voicemail, again?!
You thought this'd solve everything, didn't ya? That this would adequately convey what you thought of this shitty world, huh?
That's something that always pissed me off, y'know? This whole romanticizing suicide bullshit. Like we're all Romeo and Juliet.
'Cause you're sooo fucking original, aren't you?
The only thing you proved is that you don't give a fuck about your friends. Am I right?!

entries.maleVariant: Endless horizon... wind in your hair... free from money, status...
Or is it more like bugs splattin' against your windshield, sand in your breakfast and rattlesnakes sneakin' up on you while you take a shit?
I don't know who you're tryna fool, V. Badlands? Come on, so not you.
Sooner or later you'll be back in Night City. I know you will.
And when you do... you know who to call. Who knows, might even have it in me to forgive you.
Anyway, uh... Have fun eatin' possums. Bye.
Listen, don't take this the wrong way or anything – I love having an input who's also Night City's bad boy...
But I wouldn't mind just sittin' on the couch once in a while and listenin' to some music, or watchin' some garbage sitcom with a bowl of popcorn.
So, anyway... lemme know when you're back in the city, and... grab some olives on your way back, OK? My martinis look sad without 'em.
Actually, you know what... Forget it, I'll buy 'em myself.
And get back in one piece, V. All right?
Y'know, I've been through my fair share of shitty breakups. Guy once dumped me by text, caught another one balls deep in some other piece of ass...
But what YOU went and pulled... vanishing into thin air, not answering calls, no letters, pretending nothing happened between us... just – wow. You've really set the bar low.
So congrats. You really are one-of-a-kind after all.

entries.femaleVariant: Do you ever answer the phone? Like, ever? Seriously, I can get through to DataTerm customer service faster than you. Hurgh...
What did I even wanna... Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah. You know that Us Cracks agent called me, and asked if I would go on tour with them?
At first I was like, "Over my dead fucking body." But then I thought, hey wait, that could actually be fun. So, eh… who knows.
Welp, there's the latest gossip for you, if you even care... Call me back when you can, OK? Bye!
entries.maleVariant: Welp, there's the latest gossip for you, if you even care... Call me back when you can, OK? Peace out!
